title: are riot staffs mum died to not get me good people?
body:
fking i get more than 1300 win in normals, and really fking idiot riot just team me with some noobs that r only fking have 80 wins and play yi with the fastest speed to run off, and i figure out fking every time the yi in our team is bullshit while the yi in the other team can carry . so did riot dick heads try to fking ruin the game by team shit people with good ones rather than have both teams with players all around the same lv?\

and any one received any emails from the riot match making teams? fking they give me email and let me mail to them for the complain and fking no body answerd? so r the riot staff members dads died as weLL?

as a follow,now another game with a 94 win er tell me riot? am i trainning players for ya fking dick heads? and free of charge? after i spent money in ya game? fking ur mum died people team me with bullshits? (other team has no body less than 300 wins)

replies.body: Bronze 4. Where you belong. Never improve cause you don't realise how shit you are.
